video.title: Cuckoo
video.synopsis: Rachel shocks her proper British parents when she marries an American hippie, but it's just the first in a series of surprises for the family.

episodes.synopsis: The Thompsons reluctantly welcome new son-in-law Cuckoo into their home, but his New Age philosophy soon pushes patriarch Ken to the limit.
episodes.title: The Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Ken's attempt to lay down some ground rules for Cuckoo at a family meeting has a devastating effect on daughter Rachel's homecoming party.
episodes.title: Family Meeting

episodes.synopsis: Ken is thrilled to be chosen for a political position, but Dylan derails his plans. Given his interest in politics, Cuckoo has plenty of advice.
episodes.title: Ken On E

episodes.synopsis: Ken fears that Cuckoo will ruin his father-in-law's birthday celebration, but a cat's intervention turns Cuckoo into a hero and Ken into a villain.
episodes.title: Grandfather's Cat

episodes.synopsis: Cuckoo convinces Lorna's best friend to make some huge life changes, including the pursuit of a career as a singer. One small problem: She can't sing.
episodes.title: Connie Sings

episodes.synopsis: When Cuckoo and Rachel realize that their marriage wasn't legal, a new ceremony is planned, but Ken plots to get rid of his son-in-law for good.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Ken looks forward to some time to himself when Dylan leaves for university, but a stranger with an all-too-familiar nature shows up at his door.
episodes.title: A New Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Dylan throws a party, hoping it leads to sex with his girlfriend. Dale takes over Cuckoo's potato van and provides some sketchy food.
episodes.title: Potato Party

episodes.synopsis: Steve threatens to reveal sensitive information if Ken doesn't represent him in a malpractice case. Ben sets up Dale with Rachel's friend Natalie.
episodes.title: Tribunal

episodes.synopsis: Ken takes Dale and Dylan to his old professor's funeral, determined to retrieve a book the man had borrowed. All three manage to cause a ruckus.
episodes.title: Funeral

episodes.synopsis: Ken is up for a big promotion at work, but when he tries to discredit a colleague who's also being considered, he stumbles on some odd video footage.
episodes.title: Ken At Work

episodes.synopsis: Ken feels emasculated when Dale has to intervene in warding off an intruder. Rachel has conflicting feelings about moving in with Ben.
episodes.title: Neighbourhood Watch

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas approaches, Lorna reveals surprising news while Ben and Dale do what they can to make the holiday special for Rachel.
episodes.title: Christmas Special

episodes.synopsis: Past her due date, Lorna proposes a baby care idea that Ken only pretends to support. Rachel's romantic hopes are dashed when Dale returns from China.
episodes.title: Birth

episodes.synopsis: Dale and Ken help Rachel when she applies too late for her dream job at Nina's nonprofit, although their definition of "help" is not strictly legal.
episodes.title: The Application

episodes.synopsis: Ken rejects Lorna's fears that a rival new mother has her eyes on him, but a bizarre series of events prove Lorna's concerns to be well founded.
episodes.title: Mum's Group

episodes.synopsis: Lorna forgets Ken's birthday, which is disrupted by Steve bearing a cask of home brew and a board game that conjures up Dale's memories of China.
episodes.title: Life Of Dale

episodes.synopsis: When a jilted Dylan wants to drop out of university three weeks in, Ken and Dale take a road trip to campus on a mission to make him change his mind.
episodes.title: University Challenged

episodes.synopsis: Dale prepares a very special contribution to baby Sid's naming-day ceremony, while Ken's mom visits from Spain and creates havoc with her tarot cards.
episodes.title: Sid's Big Day

episodes.synopsis: Ken conceals his secret agenda during the family's relaxing holiday in Cumbria, where the truth also catches up to Dale in more ways than one.
episodes.title: The Holiday
